title: Émile Schneider (actor)
text:
Émile Schneider (born March 30, 1989 in <a href="Granby%2C%20Quebec">Granby, Quebec</a>) is a Canadian film and television actor. He is most noted for his performance in the film "<a href="Where%20Atilla%20Passes">Where Atilla Passes</a> (Là où Attila passe)", for which he garnered a nomination for the <a href="Prix%20Iris%20for%20Best%20Actor">Prix Iris for Best Actor</a> in 2017.
He has also appeared in the films "Après la neige", "The Lion's Path (Le rang du lion)", "Les poètes de Ferré", "<a href="Kiss%20Me%20Like%20a%20Lover">Kiss Me Like a Lover</a> (Embrasse-moi comme tu m'aimes)", "Le pacte des anges", "<a href="Forgotten%20Flowers">Forgotten Flowers</a> (Les fleurs oubliées)", "<a href="I%27ll%20End%20Up%20in%20Jail">I'll End Up in Jail</a> (Je finirai en prison)", "<a href="Maria%20Chapdelaine%20%282021%20film%29">Maria Chapdelaine</a>" and "<a href="The%20Vinland%20Club">The Vinland Club</a> (Le Club Vinland)", and the television series "<a href="Trauma%20%28Canadian%20TV%20series%29">Trauma</a>", "Mémoires vives", "L'Imposteur", "<a href="Sortez-moi%20de%20moi">Sortez-moi de moi</a>" and "<a href="Portrait-Robot">Portrait-Robot</a>" (2021).
